txt.en:
'Greetings, friend! I was just about to head out to fetch water. We haven't got a good source of water here, so collecting snow in buckets is our only choice. I can't set up the buckets here -- on account of the foot traffic -- so instead I have groups of buckets at a few different locations close by.

'Of course, retrieving them can be a pain when working alone. If you'd like to help me, we'll get our water much faster!

'Follow the road south-east through Tharkh Shathur, and you'll see a snowy overlook before long. I have some buckets set up at the top. Watch out for the wild animals there!'
Dági at Ashmargathâl will want to know about the Orc footprints you found.
You should check on and collect melted snow from Dági's collection buckets.\n\nHe placed the buckets at a snowy overlook to the south-east of Ashmargathâl, just off the road in Tharkh Shathur.
The collection buckets have been tampered with.\n\nChecking the surrounding snow for clues may point you to the right direction.
As the one in charge of collecting usable water, Dági might work faster this time with your help.
Examine the disturbed snow for tracks
These buckets have been tampered with
'So you saw Orc tracks too, did you? Ugh. Depriving us of our water, or worse. We'll have to put a stop to this, lest we die of thirst instead!'
Fresh footprints, belonging to a single Orc
